version_description: - Fix the bug that window-open links doesn't work correctly on iPad
- Fix the bug that window-open links doesn't work correctly on iPad
Fix some bugs
Fix some bugs
- Support iOS8, iPhone6, iPhone6 Plus
- Support iOS8, iPhone6, iPhone6 Plus
- Fix the search bar position bug on iOS8
- Fix the search bar position bug on iOS8
- Fixed the issue that useragent string is wrong on some device.
- Fixed the issue that useragent string is wrong on some device.

New Features
- Support iPhone6s/6sPlus 3D touch shortcut.
- Tab menu appears when longtap on a tab.
- Improved filemanager usability.
- Improved search history usability.
Bug fixes
- Fix the bug that Bookmerkets doesn't work.
- Fix some small bugs.

New Features
- Support iPhone6s/6sPlus 3D touch shortcut.
- Tab menu appears when longtap on a tab.
- Improved filemanager usability.
- Improved search history usability.
Bug fixes
- Fix the bug that Bookmerkets doesn't work.
- Fix some small bugs.
- Some bug fixes
- Some bug fixes

Improvement

- Support latest Firefox Sync
- Support iOS9

Bug Fixes

-Fix the bug that Twitter Search button doesn't work
- Fix the bug that the position of status bar somethimes gets uncollect position

Improvement

- Support latest Firefox Sync
- Support iOS9

Bug Fixes

-Fix the bug that Twitter Search button doesn't work
- Fix the bug that the position of status bar somethimes gets uncollect position
- Fix location information doesn't work on the map website
- Fix location information doesn't work on the map website

- Support iOS10
- Fix some bugs

- Support iOS10
- Fix some bugs
- Fix a issue with TLSv1.0 server on https
- Fix a issue with TLSv1.0 server on https
- Fixed an issue crush when save image
- Fixed an issue crush when save image
- Fix a crash bug
- Fix a crash bug
- Resolved an issue that FireFox Sync does not work.
- Resolved an issue that FireFox Sync does not work.

- Add LockScreen function
- Change maximum tab size to 8 for redusing crash because of memory overflow

- Add LockScreen function
- Change maximum tab size to 8 for redusing crash because of memory overflow
Fix crash bug when resume tabs
Fix crash bug when resume tabs

-Adopt WKWebView (same as Safari) for the engine, and the HTML operation speed has improved greatly
-Screen layout improved
-Context Menu is added
-The behavior of the address bar has changed
-Searching is now possible from the address bar
-Bookmark sync with Firefox has been removed
-Configuration screen is now easier to use
-App name is changed from "iLunascape" to "Lunascape"

-Adopt WKWebView (same as Safari) for the engine, and the HTML operation speed has improved greatly
-Screen layout improved
-Context Menu is added
-The behavior of the address bar has changed
-Searching is now possible from the address bar
-Bookmark sync with Firefox has been removed
-Configuration screen is now easier to use
-App name is changed from "iLunascape" to "Lunascape"

New in Lunascape 9.0.1
- Fix the bugs related to migration of the bookmarks from the old version of the app
- Add UI support for iPhoneX
- Improve tab bar animation and fix tab bar order
- Improve animation and performances
- Add feature to handle URL scheme in iOS and handle iTune url to open iTune app
- Fix some bugs to prevent the app crash
- Fix bugs where sometimes adding link to bookmark was incorrect

New in Lunascape 9.0.1
- Fix the bugs related to migration of the bookmarks from the old version of the app
- Add UI support for iPhoneX
- Improve tab bar animation and fix tab bar order
- Improve animation and performances
- Add feature to handle URL scheme in iOS and handle iTune url to open iTune app
- Fix some bugs to prevent the app crash
- Fix bugs where sometimes adding link to bookmark was incorrect

- Improved app performance
- Supported Bookmarklet
- Changed to keep selected bookmark folder state
- Fixed a bug GoBack sometimes does not work
- Fixed a wrong string in Useragent list
- Fixed a bug that bookmarks are recorded in the wrong folder
- Fixed a bug that several view states become wrong when rotating
- Fixed a number of other minor bugs

- Improved app performance
- Supported Bookmarklet
- Changed to keep selected bookmark folder state
- Fixed a bug GoBack sometimes does not work
- Fixed a wrong string in Useragent list
- Fixed a bug that bookmarks are recorded in the wrong folder
- Fixed a bug that several view states become wrong when rotating
- Fixed a number of other minor bugs

- Remember the last opened bookmark folder and page scroll position in bookmark list.
- Also, Improve the performance and animation of the Bookmark List and edit bookmark page.
- Limiting the number of browsing History to 1000.
- Improve the performance of the File list.
- Fix an error in “Save Page” option where HTML files were saving with same names and losing its details.
- Add acknowledgment screen
- Improve the UI for iPhoneX users
- Fix some more bugs regarding app crashes and Improve the app overall performance.

- Remember the last opened bookmark folder and page scroll position in bookmark list.
- Also, Improve the performance and animation of the Bookmark List and edit bookmark page.
- Limiting the number of browsing History to 1000.
- Improve the performance of the File list.
- Fix an error in “Save Page” option where HTML files were saving with same names and losing its details.
- Add acknowledgment screen
- Improve the UI for iPhoneX users
- Fix some more bugs regarding app crashes and Improve the app overall performance.

Improvements:
-Added a new tab setting called "Open New Tab from AddressBar". By this setting on, if you put URL or search word in the address bar, it will open the URL or search result in a new tab.
- Change the name of the setting "Search in New Tab" to "Open New Tab from SearchBar"
-Improve the functionality of the bookshelf in Books.
-Improve the Address bar animation.
-Make a small change where Address bar will not appear every time you switch tab.
-Fixed an issue where saved files were not appearing at the bottom of the file manager list.
-Fixed an issue where long bookmark folder name was overlapping in the navigation bar.
-Fixed the height of search bar and find-in-page bar when in-call bar appears.
-Fixed an issue where users can not hide the keyboard when there is no tab open.
-Fixed an issue where Google map URL scheme was not working from the address bar.

Improvements:
-Added a new tab setting called "Open New Tab from AddressBar". By this setting on, if you put URL or search word in the address bar, it will open the URL or search result in a new tab.
- Change the name of the setting "Search in New Tab" to "Open New Tab from SearchBar"
-Improve the functionality of the bookshelf in Books.
-Improve the Address bar animation.
-Make a small change where Address bar will not appear every time you switch tab.
-Fixed an issue where saved files were not appearing at the bottom of the file manager list.
-Fixed an issue where long bookmark folder name was overlapping in the navigation bar.
-Fixed the height of search bar and find-in-page bar when in-call bar appears.
-Fixed an issue where users can not hide the keyboard when there is no tab open.
-Fixed an issue where Google map URL scheme was not working from the address bar.

● Fix an issue where Bookmark layout collapses when editing and reordering the bookmarks.
● Improve long Bookmark list loading performance. Also improve the scrolling of the bookmarks and Bookmark reorder feature in bookmark edit mode.
● Improve long History List loading performance. Also Improve the scrolling of the long lists. Now it does not stops scrolling when the list is big.
● Close the extra tab created by the Deep links, when it redirects to any external App.
● Show alert message before opening any new tab when there is already 8 tabs opened.
● Add Loading Indicator when loading bookmark list and Book list or History list.
● Improve the Booklist loading performance.
● Clear all the search History from Search page when restarting the app in "Delete Privacy Data" setting is ON.
● Prevent any page navigations more than one time if a button is clicked more than one time. It improves all the page transition performance.
● Fix some more bugs regarding performance and improve the all over performance of the app.

● Fix an issue where Bookmark layout collapses when editing and reordering the bookmarks.
● Improve long Bookmark list loading performance. Also improve the scrolling of the bookmarks and Bookmark reorder feature in bookmark edit mode.
● Improve long History List loading performance. Also Improve the scrolling of the long lists. Now it does not stops scrolling when the list is big.
● Close the extra tab created by the Deep links, when it redirects to any external App.
● Show alert message before opening any new tab when there is already 8 tabs opened.
● Add Loading Indicator when loading bookmark list and Book list or History list.
● Improve the Booklist loading performance.
● Clear all the search History from Search page when restarting the app in "Delete Privacy Data" setting is ON.
● Prevent any page navigations more than one time if a button is clicked more than one time. It improves all the page transition performance.
● Fix some more bugs regarding performance and improve the all over performance of the app.

- Add new feature, user can save Bookmarklet type links directly by long pressing on the bookmarklet link.
- Fix issue where search suggestions were showing unknown characters
- Improve the layout design in iPhoneX, Xr, Xs models
- Fix many Bugs and improve the app performance
- Please feel free to submit your feedback and reviews

- Show Progress Bar when loading a webpage
- Show an Empty message when there are no Bookmark items available in the list
- Show an Empty message when History list is empty
- Improve Bookmark editing and reordering function
- Pull down the webview to refresh/reload the webpage
- Show release note as a separate view. You also can find the release note by navigating to Setting> Help> Release Note
- Fix an issue where users can not search some key words which have .(Dot) sign
- Fix a bug where screen scrolling position is sometimes wrong when you close all the Tabs
- Fix a bug where App was crashing after login for Book downloading
- Solve many other bugs regarding app crash and Improve Overall app performance```

- Fix issue where Incorrect search suggestion result shows in the Japanese language
- Fix the screen layout of iPhone Xr and iPhone Xs models.
- Fix issue where URL schemes were not working from the app
- Fix many Bugs and improve the app performance
- Please feel free to submit your feedback and reviews
-Fix issue where we can not see Bookmarks in iPad devices.

- Fix issue where Incorrect search suggestion result shows in the Japanese language
- Fix the screen layout of iPhone Xr and iPhone Xs models.
- Fix issue where URL schemes were not working from the app
- Fix many Bugs and improve the app performance
- Please feel free to submit your feedback and reviews
-Fix issue where we can not see Bookmarks in iPad devices.

-Add Request for Desktop/Mobile Site feature in the context menu. Now you can easily see the PC version of any website.
-Sometimes Status bar of the iOS does not hide when we rotate the app, Fix this issue, Now if you rotate the app, it will automatically hide the StatusBar.
-Fix the loading error of some Websites. After the iOS upgrade to 12, some web pages (Lunascape home page) was not finishing the loading process, Fixed this issue in this version.
-Fix issue, the context menu cannot be seen properly when we rotate the screen.
-Fix many Bugs and improve the app performance.

Please feel free to submit your feedback and reviews!

-Add Request for Desktop/Mobile Site feature in the context menu. Now you can easily see the PC version of any website.
-Sometimes Status bar of the iOS does not hide when we rotate the app, Fix this issue, Now if you rotate the app, it will automatically hide the StatusBar.
-Fix the loading error of some Websites. After the iOS upgrade to 12, some web pages (Lunascape home page) was not finishing the loading process, Fixed this issue in this version.
-Fix issue, the context menu cannot be seen properly when we rotate the screen.
-Fix many Bugs and improve the app performance.

Please feel free to submit your feedback and reviews!

- Please feel free to submit your feedback and reviews

大変長らくお待たせしました！
皆様からのご要望が多かった下記の点を修正いたしました。
-別アプリなどを起動した時に再起動してしまう不具合を修正しました。

大変長らくお待たせしました！

- Fixed a bug that text could not be selected on models without 3D Touch.

- Fixed an issue where the game would sometimes freeze
This fix may cause a temporary problem where you can't select text on models that don't have the 3D Touch feature, but this will be fixed in future versions.
